question: What should happen to a rapist?
answer:
QUESTION
If someone has raped someone in your family and the land of the law has cleared him of any wrong doing. But you are 100% sure that he was the person who raped the member of your family. What does Islam says to do to that person (rapist).
ANSWER


Share:
Since you are living in a non-Islamic stage, there is nothing you can do by%0D%0Away of retribution. You are not allowed to take the law into your own hands.%0D%0A%0D%0AWe are sure that this incident had deeply hurt you but you will have to take%0D%0Aup courage and adopt Sabr.
